Desc.entry: Annual festival in June that promotes peace and understanding by bringing together communities through artistic, musical and vocal expression. Organised by local artists, musicians, students and event organisers working together in a not-for-profit collective. The festival is now in it's 8th year and is funded by money raised prior to the event through local fundraising events and activities. Profits made from the actual festival are donated to one local and one international charity each year. The festival committee welcomes volunteers to help with fundraising, organising and stewarding the festival, see website for more details.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st and last Wed in the month 6-8pm (Committee meetings)
